BibleStudyGui::UIBrowseVersesWidget

BibleStudyGui::UIBrowseVersesWidget Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that allows the user to browse the verses of all Translation objects. More...

#include <UIBrowseVersesWidget.h>

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that allows the user to browse the verses of all Translation objects.
